snippet: As regulators look to protect consumers, a panel of the National Association of Insurance Commissioners analyzed steps that states can take to mitigate expected rises.
abstract: State regulators are looking for ways to protect consumers against increases in health insurance rates that are anticipated in 2014, as health care reform law takes effect; National Association of Insurance Commissioners panel analyzes steps that states can take to mitigate expected rises.
lead_paragraph: As regulators look to protect consumers, a panel of the National Association of Insurance Commissioners analyzed steps that states can take to mitigate expected rises.

headline.seo: Commission Gives Insight on Expected Health Increases
headline.main: Paper Offers Options on Limiting Higher Health Rates
headline.print_headline: Paper Offers Options on Limiting Higher Health Rates

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
